content: Pipe vacuum baseplate DD-HD30-VBPP ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Diamond coring- - - ### FEATURES: ### TECHNICAL DATA: For use with: DD-HD 30 Fixation mode: Vacuum Product information: Vacuum pad to drill in pipes with DD-HD 30 drill stands.
